text: Closing #Iowa arguments on radio @LarryKudlowShow. Plus stock market outlook for 2012.#GOP sweep=better econ=#KingDollar=bullish. #tcot
#MittRomney 45, #Obama 39. Is handwriting on wall?Very bullish for stocks, along with profits,moderate growth,low rates,falling gold.#tcot

Behind the Euro story, US econ looks OK. Better consumer confidence, lower jobless claims, #ISMs above 50, good trade. Bull run for stocks?

All I can say is that I like #HermanCain's 9-9-9 a lot better than the new accusations against him.
Ray of hope in jobs report:small biz household survey up 335K ave past 3 months. Mostly full-time jobs.But corp payrolls still small.
